name: ext-msg-amqp-c
description: AMQP 0-9-1 driver using rabbitmq-c; integrates with std.msg envelope and RR replay (pinned via arch/msg/amqp).
docs:
AMQP 0-9-1 driver using rabbitmq-c; integrates with std.msg.* envelope and RR replay (pinned via arch/msg/amqp).

Modules:
- std.msg.amqp
- std.msg.amqp.topology
- std.msg.amqp.rr
- std.msg.amqp.tests

Usage:
- Add dependency: x07 pkg add ext-msg-amqp-c@0.1.0
- Replay from RR cassettes in solve-rr with std.rr.with_policy_v1 + std.msg.amqp.rr.replay_driver_v1.
